attributes.action: Stop All Taxes/Laws/Decisions based on Global Warming until it has been 100% proved by REAL scientists that Global Warming is Man Made!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Global warming has still not be scientifically proved to be man made. Every day we hear differing stories from different sources on global warming. The goverment tells us it's our fault and that we should pay for it through taxes and sacrifices, whereas some scientists tell us it is natural and we should not believe them. Please stop all taxes/laws/decisions based on Global Warming until it is entirely proved that global warming IS MAN MADE, not based on fiction, stories, scaremongering and money making on behalf of the government!

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
